contest-event.event-date:
April 25, 1982 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section B)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section B) 20 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-section-b
Civic Hall, Holmfirth rizes - 1st £60 and shield, 2nd £35, 3rd £25, 4th £15. March contest - 1st(£10 and cup) Meltham and Meltham Mills 85, 2nd(£5) Holme Silver 84. Hymn tune contest - 1st(£10 and cup) Holme 85, 2nd(£5) Meltham 84. 7 bands competed. 56th annual contest.
April 6, 2012, 8:38 a.m. June 26, 2016, 9:44 a.m.
1 Holme Silver (Disposables UK Group) Band David Hirst The Shipbuilders
2 Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Kevin Wadsworth Land of the Ever Young
3 Boarshurst 'B' Eric Landon Partita [unknown composer]
4 Honley Silver Band Herbert H. Howarth Excelsior [Hanmer]
Unknown Result Shepley John Sheard Indian Summer
Unknown Result Thurlstone Brass Band Eric Crossley Snowdon Fantasy
Unknown Result Hinchliffe Mill Band R. Broadhead Excelsior [Hanmer]
